info.title: FabricAdminClient
info.description: Fabric location operation endpoints and objects.

get.description: Returns a list of all fabric locations.

parameters.name: subscriptionId
parameters.description: Subscription credentials that uniquely identify Microsoft Azure subscription. The subscription ID forms part of the URI for every service call.

parameters.name: subscriptionId
parameters.description: Subscription credentials that uniquely identify Microsoft Azure subscription. The subscription ID forms part of the URI for every service call.

location.description: The region where the resource is located.

exclusiveAdminOperationName.description: Name of the running exclusive admin operation.

exclusiveAdminOperationRunning.description: Value for whether an exclusive admin operation is running.

externalDNSIPAddress01.description: First external IP address of the DNS server.

externalDNSIPAddress02.description: Second external IP Address of the DNS server.

pepIpAddresses.description: The IP addresses of the privileged endpoints.

shutDownActionPlanEndTime.description: Last known stamp stop time for the shut down action plan.

shutDownActionPlanStartTime.description: Last known stamp start time for the shut down action plan

stampInformationId.description: The deployment id of the stamp.

startUpActionPlanEndTime.description: Last known stamp stop time for the start up action plan.

startUpActionPlanStartTime.description: Last known stamp start time for the start up action plan.

timeServer.description: The IP address of the time server.

FabricLocationModel.description: All properties of a fabric location resource.

azure_auth.description: Authorization uses an Azure Active Directory OAuth2 flow.
